Author: gejdog
Text: thank you so much for your nice comment, i just wanted to rant, and it’s honestly really great to get a response like that, i’ll try my best and same goes to you

Author: radicalcantaloop
Text: I’ve been exactly where you are. I know how hard it is and I’m sorry that you’re struggling. I just want you to know that your grades don’t reflect your worth. It seems like it, and I know that it’s not fun to feel like you could do better, but just try your best and that’s good enough. You’re going to get through this and then your grades won’t matter in a year’s time. Hell, they probably won’t matter much after this semester is over either. Just keep pushing through. You’ve got this.
